properties.name: Normal imperative + normal negative
properties.description: The prohibitive uses the verbal construction of the second singular imperative and a sentential negative strategy found in (indicative) declaratives

properties.name: Normal imperative + special negative
properties.description: The prohbitive uses the verbal construction of the second singular imperative and a sentential negative strategy not found in (indicative) declaratives

properties.name: Special imperative + normal negative
properties.description: The prohibitive uses a verbal construction other than the second singular imperative and a sentential negative strategy found in (indicative) declaratives

properties.name: Special imperative + special negative
properties.description: The prohibitive uses a verbal construction other than the second singular imperative and a sentential negative strategy not found in (indicative) declaratives

name: The Prohibitive
contributors: Johan van der Auwera and Ludo Lejeune with Valentin Goussev
